 Chooses the command which should be executed next from the given channel Choice is made based on command_ordering_algorithm from system config Command returned is not yet removed from the per_bank_command_queue from which it was selected.

tick *  transFinishTime 
) [protected, virtual]

Moves the specified channel to at least the time given.

Parameters:
endTime move the channel until it is at this time
transFinishTime the time that this transaction finished
